name: Siddham Living

reviews.text: I had such a great experience here! The environment is very calming and zen‚Äîperfect for relaxing and unwinding. It‚Äôs also a great way to bond with friends or family. There are lots of activities to choose from, and I especially loved how they incorporate essential oils into the experience. Highly recommend!

Had my bridal experience here and they supplied and set up the bridal decoration for the perfume workshop, besides that they have an array of workshops like charms and soap making but we chose perfume and it was a wonderful experience. Also the owner went above and beyond and helped me fix my charm for my shades for free! Excellent service and I highly recommend to my friends (:

Made Essential Oil Shower Gel today at Siddham! I really love the ambiance, very calming; with a calming background music playing, and the workshop smells so good the moment you step into it.

The staffs in charged were so polite & nice, always available and happy to assist all the time. It was also such a great experience to create and diy my own soap!

Looooove it here! üíóüíóüíó

Super easy and chill place! We made lipsticks and there were 10 shades to choose from, you can mix colours too. But don‚Äôt expect a 1-1 instructor, you‚Äôre made to self learn via a youtube video. But it‚Äôs fairly easy to follow!

You can get the basic case or top up 10RM for a cuter case of your choice!
place is very zen and comfortable. there‚Äôs many different DIY workshops here available and instructor was clear with her instructions. overall very satisfied üòä
